title: reactivated old account (account name changed)
body: i reactivated my old account. its been years since i played a lot of things changed. my account name no longer exists. instead i got  gibberish id number.. i cannot remember my old account name but could someone please change my account name for me. contact me i have a name i want to use thanks in advance.

replies.body: Welcome back to League of Legends, where the game is amazing and the skins are even more amazing. Seriously, have you seen the previews for the new Star Guardians? THEY ARE AMAZZZZZZING. On a serious note, it's likely since you weren't active for so long the name was cleaned from the account. The great news is though that if you submit a ticket over to our [account team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we can help change that name up for you. Good luck on the fields of justice, or death...ya know. Just in case you get creamed.
